item.title: My First Post
item.description:
subtitle: Hello World! Hi! This is my first post using Hugo + PaperMod! I am a software developer living in Seoul, South Korea. Welcome to my blog everyone!

Here is an inline equation: $E = mc^2$.

And a block equation: $$ \int_{a}^{b} f(x) , dx = F(b) - F(a) $$
